mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , CONCAT(F_GET_CODE_NAME('REM',USER_REGION_MASTER), ' ',F_GET_CODE_NAME('RGD',USER_REGION_DETAIL) ) USER_REGION_NAME FROM tb_user WHERE 1=1
